WeeklyDataPoint.description: This object represents a weekly gas measurement taken from Mauna Loa observatory.

timestamp.desciption: The unix timestamp of when the measurement was recorded. This is always recorded as a date with the time portion of the timestamp set to zero.

year.desciption: The year this measurement was taken.

month.desciption: The month this measurement was taken.

day.desciption: The day representing the start of the week for this measurement. Measurements are taken hourly and averaged together over a week.

decimal.desciption: A decimal representation of the week this measurement was taken.

average.desciption: The average gas measurement recorded for the week.

data.desciption: The CO2 mole fraction in dry air for this measurement (in parts-per-million)

days.desciption: The number of days measurements were taken to compute the weekly average.

oneYearAgo.desciption: The CO2 mole fraction in dry air (in parts-per-million) exactly 365 days prior to this measurement.

tenYearsAgo.desciption: The CO2 mole fraction in dry air (in parts-per-million) exactly 10*365 days + 3 days (for leap years) prior to this measurement.

since1800.desciption: The CO2 mole fraction difference in dry air (in parts-per-million) between this measurement and measurements from 1800.
